As you know that Identity v2 Sample does not have any Token Authentication, so I manually set up by myself, everything looks good to me, the only problem I am running through from the last 5,6 days, /Token end point can’t be accessible which suppose to be expose by Owin Middleware. Can you please put your suggestion in answer to this question
